props.label: staticText 1
props.content:
Please note: Submission and receipt of this form does not imply or give tacit consent or authorisation to the grant of a permit. The Council will contact you within the next 5 working days in respect of processing your application.

Please note: A separate form should be completed for each collection date requested.
